translations: v.涌浪；胀罐（swell 的第三人称单数形式）

sentences.sentence: When IT is operating as it should, employee self-confidence swells.
sentences.translation: 当 IT 正常运行时，员工的自信心就会增强。

sentences.sentence: "These swells of water come ashore at tremendous speeds and cause most of the damage done to beach-front buildings," said Huff.
sentences.translation: 赫夫说：“这些巨浪以惊人的速度涌向海岸，对海滨建筑造成了很大的破坏。”
